textAfterTable: IX Schema This section lists the names of the scripts that create the Information Exchange (IX) schema group and describes the objects in the schemas. Table 5-23 lists the IX scripts in alphabetical order, while Table 5-24 lists its objects. Table 5-23 Information Exchange (IX) Schema Scripts Script Name Description cix_v3.sql Creates the IX schema objects dix_v3.sql Drops the IX schema objects ix_main.sql Main script for the IX schema; calls other scripts vix_v3.sql Enables, disables, and verifies IX objects Table 5-24 IX Objects
